field.value: ColumnRenderer with an empty enumeration still renders table start and end sections

field.name: description
field.value:
Could not find documentation saying that but: #blockcomponent(ColumnRenderer with "cols=4" "items=$logos") #empty No logos/headshots uploaded. #end ... renders: No logos/headshots uploaded.
What isn't a good chunk of HTML. The component should not render the start and endblock section when empty, because even if documented it is cumbersome to have: #blockcomponent(ColumnRenderer with "cols=4" "items=$logos") #empty No logos/headshots uploaded. #end But as that may break things for deployed solution, i suggest to add a boolean "emptyness" parameter that when set, would not render any other section besides empty when the collection is empty. Suggested patch attached
